summary: A small and quick follower mod for a strong Nordic follower.
descriptionHtml: Bjorn is a Nord, as Norse as they come. He is located at The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold and will join you for the pure incentive of adventure, glory, and honor. Bjorn specializes in Heavy Armor, Block, One-Handed, and Archery. He also has a default outfit and weapons made for the cold and strength. Bjorn doesn't care about what crimes you commit, and is always eager to assist you and your other allies. He is in it till Valhalla (Sovngarde).
author: Jeg_Drepe
